content:
ImageSource Class

Definition

Represents an object type that has a width, height, and ImageMetadata such as a BitmapSource and a DrawingImage. This is an abstract class.

In this Article

[System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter(typeof(System.Windows.Media.ImageSourceConverter))]
[System.Windows.Localizability(System.Windows.LocalizationCategory.None, Readability=System.Windows.Readability.Unreadable)]
[System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer(typeof(System.Windows.Media.ImageSourceValueSerializer))]
public abstract class ImageSource : System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable, IFormattable

Properties

Height

When overridden in a derived class, gets the height of the image in measure units (96ths of an inch).

public abstract double Height { get; }
Value
Double

The height of the image.

Attributes
TypeConverterAttribute LocalizabilityAttribute ValueSerializerAttribute

Metadata

When overridden in a derived class, gets the ImageMetadata associated with the image.

public abstract System.Windows.Media.ImageMetadata Metadata { get; }
Value
ImageMetadata

The metadata associated with the image.

Attributes
TypeConverterAttribute LocalizabilityAttribute ValueSerializerAttribute

Width

When overridden in a derived class, gets the width of the image in measure units (96ths of an inch).

public abstract double Width { get; }
Value
Double

The width of the image in measure units (96ths of an inch).

Attributes
TypeConverterAttribute LocalizabilityAttribute ValueSerializerAttribute

Methods

Clone()

Creates a modifiable clone of this ImageSource, making deep copies of this object's values. When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

public System.Windows.Media.ImageSource Clone ();
Returns
ImageSource

A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's stem.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen* property will be false even if the source's stem.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen* property was true.

Attributes
TypeConverterAttribute LocalizabilityAttribute ValueSerializerAttribute

Remarks

This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen Freezable objects (or any Freezable object). For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.

For more information, see Clone.

CloneCurrentValue()

Creates a modifiable clone of this ImageSource object, making deep copies of this object's current values. Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.

public System.Windows.Media.ImageSource CloneCurrentValue ();
Returns
ImageSource

A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's stem.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen* property will be false even if the source's stem.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen* property was true.

Attributes
TypeConverterAttribute LocalizabilityAttribute ValueSerializerAttribute

Remarks

This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen Freezable objects (or any Freezable object). For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.

For more information, see CloneCurrentValue.

PixelsToDIPs(Double, Int32)

Converts pixels to DIPs in a way that is consistent with MIL.

protected static double PixelsToDIPs (double dpi, int pixels);
Parameters
dpi
Double

Width of the bitmap, in dots per inch.

pixels
Int32

Width of the bitmap, in pixels.

Returns
Double

The natural size of the bitmap in MIL Device Independent Pixels (DIPs, or 1/96").

Creates a string representation of this object based on the IFormatProvider passed in. If the provider is null, the stem.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture* is used.

Explicit Interface Implementations

IFormattable.ToString(String, IFormatProvider)

Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.

string IFormattable.ToString (string format, IFormatProvider provider);
Parameters
format
String

The format to use.

-or-

A null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the IFormattable implementation.

provider
IFormatProvider

The provider to use to format the value.

-or-

A null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.

Returns
String

The value of the current instance in the specified format.
